sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Change the default update_frequency to do_not_update in ml_solution</description> <name>Change default update_freq ml_solution</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary'); gr.addQuery('name', 'ml_solution'); gr.addQuery('element', 'update_frequency'); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { gr.setValue('default_value', 'do_not_update'); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-29 21:54:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>04ba74fdc72310101845e1a58dc2606c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Change default update_freq ml_solution</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">fccdbc4b6d2220100acb70b3534330f2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_04ba74fdc72310101845e1a58dc2606c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 21:54:36</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
